description: When Tyler Torro decided he wanted a dungeon built in his garage, he knew wanted the best. So Tyler commissioned Mr. Daniels to convert the space into a dark, creepy dungeon, complete with chain-link fence, bondage cross, whips, leather, and handcuffs.  Tyler can't wait to try it out!In fact, he's so eager to christen his new facilities that he's imagining what it would be like to chain up this Mr. Daniels! But it could never actually happen.  Professional young men like this don't let their clients cum all over them after a hard pounding.  Or do they?! Enjoy!
title: Dungeon Delight
